appDesc.message: Don't waste your time with compliance. Universal Bypass automatically skips annoying link shorteners.

firstrunTitle.message: Thank you for installing Universal Bypass!

firstrunTwitter.message: Follow Universal Bypass on Twitter to always be in the loop about Universal Bypass.

optionsUserscriptsSubtitle.message: It would be nice if you could submit working bypasses to GitHub, so others can benefit from it:
